caption.p: The XRD patterns of the original (1) and after long-term storage (2) sample NCN0.55, which consists of the two PLS compound: Na 2Ca 4Nb 6O 20 and Na 4Ca 4Nb 8O 26, formed in the system (1-x) NaNbO 3–xCa 2Nb 2O 7 at x = 0.55. On the the XRD pattern 1, the indexes of the diffraction reflections of only Na 2Ca 4Nb 6O 20 are shown, and on the XRD pattern 2, only the compounds of Na 4Ca 4Nb 8O 26 are shown.
